Html:
Hi!
I'm trying to develop my first app with ModernUI and I wonder how I can add the moving dots bar instead the default progress bar.

Can someone help me?
Thank you so much :)

Have a look at the sample application, specially the source file:
http://mui.codeplex.com/SourceControl/latest#1.0/FirstFloor.ModernUI/FirstFloor.ModernUI.App/Content/ControlsStylesProgressBar.xaml
It has the example that you want.
Thank you! the IsIndeterminate Property is what i was missing :)
